installing.title: Installation
installing.description: After placing an order, we start assembling your house! It takes from 2 to 4 months. The assembly is carried out using the best latest technologies that make lightness, comfort and safety available. After manufacturing, we deliver the house and install it on the site

projects.title: Projects
projects.description: Completely ready-made buildings make it easy to create a complex anywhere in Ukraine. This is what allows you to start your own business quickly. A hotel business, a complex of houses, or any other project becomes closer and more affordable with ECOMOD.

list.title: Is the design possible according to my planning?
list.description: No, the design is preserved in the main details. When placing an order, you can adjust the colors, add or remove some small interior elements.

list.title: Modular homes are only suitable for short-term stays?
list.description: No, modular houses are suitable for permanent residence. They have all the necessary communications and can also be equipped with autonomous heating and water supply systems.

list.title: The house is assembled right on the site?
list.description: No, the house is assembled at the factory, then delivered to the site, and all communications are connected on site.

list.title: How long does it take to complete?
list.description: It usually takes 2 to 4 months from the moment of signing the contract to commissioning. This period includes the production of the house, site preparation and installation.
